trans-unit.source: Create a constant variable in Local scope to store the file attributes of the current script.

trans-unit.source: Create a 1d array of the file attribute letters by splitting the string at the comma (,).

trans-unit.source: Create a 1d array using the friendlier file attribute names by splitting the string at the comma (,).

target.mrk: Create a 1d array using the friendlier file attribute names by splitting the string at the comma (,).

trans-unit.source: Loop through the attribute letters array to replace with the friendlier value e.g. A becomes Archive or S becomes System.

A becomes Archive or S becomes System.

trans-unit.source: Remove the single space and trailing forward slash.

trans-unit.source: Assign a variable with the filepath to check on whether it's a file or not.
